jump_scares.spoiler: Something appears to move in front of the camera which is filming the two astronauts on the moon and there is a loud burst of static
The camera zooms in on Nate, who is snoring, he suddenly opens his eyes and yells (as a joke)
Ben uses his camera to light up the crater, suddenly the camera flash illuminates the corpse of one of the Russian cosmonauts
The dead cosmonauts appears to jerk violently as Ben looks through his suit
There is several loud bangs and the camera that is viewing the Russian lander suddenly tips over
Nate suddenly shatters the rock with a hammer as Ben examines it
Nate, who appears to be sleeping, suddenly grabs Ben’s arm
Nate is pulled into the crater
Nate bangs on the window of the lander just as Ben is about to launch
